article_title: How To Make Obamacare Cheaper, Have One National Insurance Market

article_metadata.description: This is something of a statement of the obvious about the ACA, Obamacare: Prices were lower in states with more competition among insurers and higher in states with fewer players, the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) said in its report. Well, yes, competition does tend [...]
